text:
Says: 

The generated checksum file's name will be the original filename with "." and
fileext added to it. Defaults to the algorithm name being used.

However, "." is not appended, so a typical usage is:

    <checksum fileext=".md5">
      <fileset dir="${target.dir}" includes="*.jar"/>
    </checksum>
creator: hlship@apache.org
